column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A  school bus from Westline private school drove into a wall at 12:30 pm on September 13
column5: 2018 in Toul Pou village. ------Sangkat Chom Chao 1
column9: 2M-3669 had students and a teacher on board.------According to the report
column10: the driver fell asleep at the wheel
column11: the bus crossed the road and crashed into a house. Fortunately there were no injuries.------After the incident
column12: the authorities went  to examine the scene
column13: but the case seemed to have been resolved privately.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/370207------
